Package com.eventstore.dbclient

Class CreatePersistentSubscriptionToStreamOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eventstore.dbclient.CreatePersistentSubscriptionToStreamOptions
  • public class CreatePersistentSubscriptionToStreamOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Options for the create persistent subscription to stream request.
